title: Why did you main your champ?
body:
I've always wondered, why other people main their main.
I main Kench because i like being tanky, dealing a good amount of damage and having lots of utility.
So, why do you main a specific champ?

Because you like their play style?

Their look?

I wanna know!

Edit: WOAH! I made it on the front page!? Thank you guys so much! I even attracted a rioter to my post! :O

replies.body:
{{champion:131}} Knock knock! Who's there? The Moon...It's far away! You were alone the whole time hahaha!

The day I heard that joke, I knew she's the chosen one.
Praise the moon ^_^
{{champion:35}} I hate when other people get to have fun.

{{champion:112}}

{{champion:21}} 

Boobs.
Guns.
Sex appeal.

Do I need to say more?

Queen of the Combo
Highly rewarded for good positioning
Double Up Shenanigans

((Originally it was {{champion:114}}, but after her rework her kit no longer matched my preferred playstyle of calculated aggression into all in crushing blow.))

Used the CTRL + 1 emote and heard the following
"MY PROFESSION!?!?!.. Y'know.. I've always wanted to be a baker"
Used CTRL + 1 again 
"Yes.. A baker"

Instantly knew who my main was once I heard that ( Also cause he was my legit first champion and is currently the champion I have the most mastery points on + was my first mastery 7 ){{champion:80}}

I main {{champion:202}} just so I can blow up tanks and squishies plus his voiceover makes me wet.

http://tennislegend.free.fr/gif/quand-je-reussis-coup-gagnant-du-desespoir.gif

{{champion:92}} 
It doesn't matter what I type here now, everyone is already done caring about my thoughts.

{{champion:44}} 


 When i first layed eyes upon him and heard his soothing yet alluring voice, i immediately fell in love.  His style is unique and original, his body is simply beautiful, and he can literally bring down a star for me.

 I played him long before he got his fabulous makeover, and, i will be honest, i waited for it for so long, and i had a literal emotional orgasm when i saw him in his new OUTRAGEOUS form! It was all i've ever hoped for and more! He retained his unique style and personality, his voice is still as soothing and i adore putting myself to sleep with it. He retained his kit and mechanics, but, they got greatly improved.

 And his new body... Oh... Someone needs to make a body pillow.

 Taric is the best support in my eyes. He has everything a support should have, and more. He is the definition of perfection. Playing him just feels so soothing and relaxing. Hiis voice delicately tickles my ears while i am preserving the lives of my teammates.
 If i could bring one game character to life, it would definitely be Taric. He would be the perfect companion, partner, and above all, friend.

Thank you, Riot, for making the greatest character in video game history!

Sincerely, a HUGE Taric fan.

_Almighty._
{{champion:432}} no {{champion:432}} one {{champion:432}} can {{champion:432}} stop {{champion:432}} the {{champion:432}} chimes {{champion:432}}
{{champion:420}} I swear this isn't what it looks like
I main birb because birb
{{champion:30}} Because he looks cool, has a really fun kit to use (exploding skittles and a global damaging ult? Yes please), and also has an interesting lore.

**Because he is Draaaaaven**
Seriously though, he was the first champion I got, and I still remember playing him horribly as a tank and always feeding my ass in my first days at league, after about 30 games of playing him terribly, I decided to stop playing him and picked some different champions (Janna and Zed mostly).
When I reached gold I have decided to try playing him again, and he is my main since then, generally because I love his aggressive play style, love playing in a due lane and a big fan of his snowballing potential.

{{champion:157}} 

Because I'm silver trash
http://media.lolusercontent.com/api/embedly/1/image/resize?url=http%3A%2F%2Fimg.pandawhale.com%2Fpost-43119-Tyrion-coin-upvote-gif-Imgur-R-C7dp.gif&key=a45e967db0914c7fb472fd4381e6c85b&width=150

Varus

Playing against a bunch of tanks? Build on hit with guinsoo and melt them.
Playing against squishies? Build AD and pen and chunk them from a screen away.
Drain tank? O wait I have built in grievous wounds and burst damage.
Draven support? Don't worry I can peel entire teams by myself!
Feel like being an ap assassin. Go for it! One shot people with your ult and 60%  health damage.

Plus have you ever flashed to extend your max Q to kill someone and all there hopes and dreams? It tastes like pure salt!

{{champion:78}} 

Because you can slam people into a wall

{{champion:25}}

#I like how she looks. A very early and different look for female champions from the beta. Her default attire is a bra and a long, half-dress.
#( Õ°¬∞ Õú ñ Õ°¬∞)

But she's also pretty fun and satisfying to play with. Hitting her skills feels rewarding as they do serious damage and apply a strong CC on people. Playing her in a support position makes her a unique pick as she breaks the stereotype of supports being passive team helpers.
Her Black Shield in particular feels amazing for avoiding CC on the enemy side and that lets the ADC just go ham and not worry about the initial CC at all. Everyone on the enemy team is either forced to burn through it and waste CC on a shield to stop the champion or ignore it and let my teammate just go uninterrupted to his intended target.

{{champion:43}} just cuz she literally can play every  role but adc, is super underated even though she honestly is one of the best sup/utility mid laners. Gotta love 100-0 a {{champion:67}}  and having them type "?????" or "WTF!" in all chat. Also kiting is fun and having carries that can never die on your team is also very fun. She never really falls out of meta and has always been super consistent. Her lore is also not that bad although she really doesn't have a personality which kinda sucks but eh. On another note she can also build every single ap item and have no trouble as well as honestly every support item. She has diverse builds since you can go the {{item:3116}} {{item:3151}}  scaling build, or the {{item:3285}} {{item:3165}} full murder build and more.

{{champion:43}} {{champion:43}} {{champion:43}} {{champion:43}} {{champion:43}} {{champion:43}}
Soraka cause she pisses the neckbeards and kids off.

{{champion:102}} 

I like playing tanky champs and being up in my enemies' faces. I also like dragon and I love the concept of Shyvana. I also find her very fun to play
I fell in love with Gnar through his kit, his versatility and the sheer amount of bishoobah he rocks.
